bio:
Your one stop solution to Transcription | Virtual Assistance | Email Management needs..If you are looking for a dependable resource who can speak and write english at par with a native, has excellent exposure to working with clients in the outsourcing industry as a manager and as an executive who can be trusted with difficult, sensitive and critical tasks, I'm your man for the job!
My strength is my singular ability to intelligently relate with your requirements and give you with excellent return of your money spent on your outsourcing needs. If you're looking for a dependable resource whom you can trust with your critical tasks, i'm your guy for the job.

No upfront or advance payment needed if you are working through the guru Safe Pay escrow. I want to work through guru.com's payment system on all jobs, preferably. Cannot commit to laborious test tasks that seem to be a little unreasonable. Would welcome straight forward test tasks. Would demand things to be put in black and white as far as the requirements of the job go, right from the beginning. Not comfortable if scope of the project changes after the initial specs.

bio:
Requirement Analysis: 

    Determine and document present and future goals, objectives and
    requirements. 


    Outline model of the data to be stored, retrieved, queried and
    displayed and how that data will flow and be administered and maintained.
    

 Design: 

    Recommend appropriate technologies and methods, hardware,
    software, hosting services, scheduling and other requirements and
    considerations. 


    Confirm what will be delivered and when.
    

 Development: 

    Project progress reporting to communicate project status as
    required. 


    Demonstration of initial functionality, appearance and
    navigation. 

 Programming: 

    Completion of application coding according to defined scope and
    objectives. 

 Deployment: 

    Launch "live" application. 

 Maintenance and
Upgrades: 

    Support after deployment or additional programming beyond
    original project scope.

abstrac: Web Developer, UI Designer, Software Developer
bio:
Hi, my name is Richard Mountain, I am a Lincolnshire based developer who enjoys designing and developing front end applications and websites. I love to keep my work clean and simple and try to apply this to everything I work on including my desk. I make it my mission to create simple stylish websites of high quality and of course user friendly.

I have been developing websites for about 10 years more as a hobby than anything else however in recent years I have attempted to put my hobby to good use and make a career out of designing and developing stylish websites. My main bread earning work at present is as a software developer, developing software for a local finance company. While in my spare time I am designing new websites and attempting to improve my varied skillset.

When I’m not working on a piece of software or building/designing a website I’m playing with my little boy, training for Tough Mudder or relaxing with my friends and family.

abstrac: Market Entry and investment projects for the Middle East and North Africa. we handle Research, Strategy Development and Implementation.
bio:
From headquarter in Cairo, Egypt .Buhaisi International consulting, LLC delivers fast and effective International Business Development solutions to international companies across the Middle East and North Africa. Services include:

- Market Assessment
- Market Entry Strategy Development and Implementation
- Country Strategy Evaluation
- Commercial Due Diligence
- Business Launch and Promotion
- Business Matchmaking and Partner Search
- Country Representation
- Sales Management Consulting
- Custom B2B, B2C and Retail Market Research
- Business Intelligence.

We regularly help companies in the following sectors:

- Specialty Chemicals
- Industrial Products
- IT & Software
- Education & Training
- Automation- Precision Engineering
- Electrical & Electronics
- Healthcare
- Medical Devices
- Automotive & Aerospace Publishing
- Food & Beverage
- FMCG & Consumer Products
- Media

Co founder and Managing Partner Mr. Mohamed Buhaisi 's core competency is Sales and Marketing leadership ensures the team is striving for common objectives in a dynamic environment, through effectively assess challenges and implement strategies to maximize sales and facilitate future business relationships, maximize profit, customer retention, revenue generation, base growth and tenure.

With strong working knowledge of KPI setting, monitoring (CRM), performance review and sales development and this will allow me to represent and creatively promote stakeholder interests to a higher level all over the MENA region. and proven ability to manage projects and get them done on, or ahead, of schedule and proven ability to work independently whilst meeting financial and other targets.

Specialties:
- Sales Management Consulting
- Account Management
- Project Management
- Product Management
- Market Assessment
- Specialty Chemicals , Fragrance Compounds & Industrial Products

The first step is to develop a preliminary market study addressing all issues and factors of the market and opportunities. If the study reveals that the opportunities outweigh the challenges, then the time has come for serious work. We agree on the scope of work, budget and time line.

abstrac: We at AK FINANCIAL CONSULTANTS,provide complete answers to the needs of our clients relating to Accounting,Tax Planning & Assessment, Project Financing.
bio:
We at AK FINANCIAL CONSULTANTS,provide financial services as per the needs of our clients,We are a team of professionals consisting Chartered Accountants, Cost Accountants, & MBA’s, focussing largely on:

1. Preparation & Finalisation of Financial Records.
2. Project Financing.
3. Tax Planning & Assessment including MVAT, SERVICE TAX & TDS assistance.
4. Company Registrations
5. Compliance L.B.T
6. Budgeting
7.Payroll


*Our team is dedicated to adhere to the given time deadline, there will be no time delays.

*We provide the maximum service at minimum price in the market, as our main focus is on building long term relationship with the client and provide quality work.

*We are presently active in Nagpur,Mumbai,Pune,& Delhi, Soon we will be expanding our wings to other major corporate centres.
